policyname: Users can update reagents from their facility
qual:
(facility_id IN ( SELECT profiles.facility_id
   FROM profiles
  WHERE (profiles.id = auth.uid())))

policyname: Users can view reagents from their facility
qual:
(facility_id = ( SELECT profiles.facility_id
   FROM profiles
  WHERE (profiles.id = auth.uid())))

policyname: Users can insert reagents for their facility
with_check:
(facility_id IN ( SELECT profiles.facility_id
   FROM profiles
  WHERE (profiles.id = auth.uid())))
